p: A 2007 study by Huang and colleagues demonstrated activity against the influenza viruses, parainfluenza viruses 1, 2 and 3, adenovirus, and respiratory syncytial virus [ 52]. Curcumin was also reported to inhibit H1N1, H6N6, herpes virus, coxsackievirus B3 (CVB3), human T-cell leukemia virus type 1, hepatitis C virus, high risk human papillomaviruses 16 and 18 (HPV-16 and HPV-18) [ 53].
